name: S.C. RELOC S.A.
goal: RELOC S.A. Craiova is the biggest innovation center in the field of railway transport in Romania. The result of research and development, conducted in the over seven decades of existence, is well represented by the completion of thousands of innovative solutions and various urban rail vehicles implemented.
euInitiatives: RELOC provides relevant documents to the Romanian Railway Authorities for obtaining homologations and certification for our new innovative products and services.
